title: Chic Portugal Stay in the Heart of Porto with Rooftop Bar, Indoor Pool & Daily Breakfast
description:
Discover the storied charm of Porto with a stay at this five-star retreat in the UNESCO-listed historic city centre. Here, centuries-old architecture, literary heritage and the famed port wine tradition meet in perfect harmony. From leisurely strolls along the Douro River to tastings at local wine cellars and visits to Livraria Lello bookshop, every corner invites exploration.

Inside the hotel, the elegant Wine & Books Cafe offers the perfect spot to unwind with a light bite and a good read, while the rooftop bar serves panoramic views alongside a curated selection of wines and cocktails. At Tasca da Memória, traditional Portuguese dishes are reimagined using fresh, local ingredients. For relaxation, retreat to the onsite wellness spa, complete with sauna and indoor pool.

Whether you're wandering the colourful lanes of the Ribeira district or sampling regional flavours at the Bolhão Market, this hotel is a refined gateway to the culture, cuisine and character that make this city truly unforgettable.
offer_address: Rua de José Falcão 39-41, Porto 4050-526, Portugal

title: Modern Porto City Break with Wine Tasting, Daily Breakfast & Nightly Dinners
description:
From the sweetness of its namesake wine to colourful neighbourhoods bathed in Mediterranean sun, Porto exudes an undeniable romance - and HF Ipanema Porto is the perfect launchpad to this city of delights. Located in the sophisticated neighbourhood of Boavista, the hotel has a sleek, contemporary feel, lending an air of refinement to your stay, with an elegant collection of guestrooms adorned in effortless modern design. Exceptional facilities ensure a comfortable stay, with the chic Lobby Bar serving local and international tipples, the well-equipped fitness centre catering to conscientious travellers, and Rio's restaurant onsite to pamper your palate with lip-smacking dishes.

Enjoy the very best of Porto on your doorstep: spend your days enjoying tasting flights at the port wine producers, wandering the medieval Ribeira district or catching a concert at the Casa da Música concert hall, a postmodern landmark. Tranquil Boavista is just a 20-minute walk from Porto’s city centre, a 15-minute drive from the airport and a short stroll from the famed Mercado Bom Sucesso.

title: Portugal Stylish Porto Haven near Duoro River with Daily Buffet Breakfast
description: Overlooking the Duoro river, among centuries-old Port wine cellars, The Lodge Hotel is a luxurious Portugal escape promising fine wine and vivid vistas of Porto. Wander to nearby wine cellars to sample the famous tipples of the region, take a trip to the waterfront Cais de Gaia and experience its culinary offerings or embrace the culture and art of Portugal with a visit to the UNESCO World Heritage-listed historic centre, including the Luis I Bridge and Monastery of Serra do Pilar. After days spent exploring, visit Dona Maria restaurant for traditional dishes paired with wines from the vast cellar, take a dip in the heated outdoor pool or spend the evening refreshing your palate with classic cocktails at The Lodge Bar.
offer_address: Rue de Serpa Pinto 60, 4400-307 Vila Nova de Gaia, Porto, Portugal

title: Art-Inspired Boutique Porto Escape with Daily Breakfast, Rooftop Pool & Complimentary Minibar
description:
Centuries of culture, art and tradition are at your fingertips at this Porto stay, a designer boutique hotel inspired by history's most creative figures. Intertwining avant-garde interiors with traditional architecture, this five-star hotel infuses the Portuguese spirit into every detail.

A rooftop pool sits at its crown, perched high above the city and peeking over rooftops to the Douro River below. Enjoy a poolside tipple, or visit Digby Restaurant for rich Portuguese cuisine and a signature cocktail, featuring bouquets strung from the ceiling.

Indulge with a treatment at Calla Wellness & Spa, and when it's time to explore, wander through the art district Rua Miguel Bombarda or stroll to Livraria Lello bookstore, Crystal Palace gardens, Clérigos Church or Rua das Flores - all within a short walk of the hotel’s imposing carved doors.

title: Boutique Central Porto Escape with Rooftop Terrace & Daily Breakfast
description:
Discover the perfect blend of elegance and culture at this charming hotel in the heart of Porto. Located a stone's throw from the city's famous Ribeira district, with its colourful houses and lively riverfront, and steps from the Avenida dos Aliados, this boutique gem provides easy access to the best of the vibrant city.

Take a leisurely stroll to the nearby Livraria Lello, one of the world's most beautiful bookshops, or sample traditional Portuguese cuisine at the local tascas. After a day of exploration, retreat to your elegantly appointed room - a masterpiece of sophistication and comfort - or enjoy a refreshing drink at the hotel's chic bar. Come dusk, head to the rooftop terrace for a front-row seat to spectacular sunsets.
offer_address: R. de Sá de Noronha 70, 4050-526 Porto, Portugal

title: Heritage Porto Prestige in Historical Centre with Daily Breakfast
description:
This historic palace, Porto’s first five-star hotel, seamlessly blends centuries of avante-garde grandeur and tradition with modern luxury. Built in the 1950s and entirely renovated in 2024, this hotel, which is part of Small Luxury Hotels of the World, offers a glimpse into Porto’s rich past with a stunning stained-glass atrium, intricate wallpaper and glittering chandeliers.

Nestled in the historic centre of Porto, you are moments from Porto’s best dining, shopping and cultural sights. After exploring cobbled streets along the colourful river, retreat to Scarlett Wine & Food’s elegant courtyard for Mediterranean-inspired share plates paired with a carefully curated wine list and take a dip in the plunge pool perched on the rooftop.
offer_address: Praça D. Filipa De Lencastre 62, Porto 4050-259 PT, Portugal

title: Charming Downtown Stay with Daily Breakfast and Nightly Dinners
description: Discover the historically charming region of Porto - a coastal city in northwest Portugal brimming with bustling street-side cafes, quaint cobbled streets and colourful architecture - with a four or seven-night stay at Hotel Premium Porto Downtown. Discover classic Portuguese cuisine with nightly, three-course dinners that include wine and beer; daily buffet breakfast, a welcome glass of Porto wine on arrival and more.
offer_address: Av. de Rodrigues de Freitas 427, 4000-423 Porto, Portugal

title: Reimagined Heritage Porto Escape in Old Town with Terrace Bar, Garden Pool & Daily Breakfast
description:
Treat yourself to colour-filled streets, hearty food and boutique luxury in the birthplace of port wine. This historic masterpiece encapsulates the essence of Porto, from the tasteful and elegant use of colour throughout the property to its heritage charm and tiled architecture. Located in the heart of Porto's Cedofeita neighbourhood, this award-winning boutique stay is the perfect urban escape.

A widespread restoration introduced this 19th-century gem to contemporary comforts while preserving the original beauty of the building. With only 72 rooms, the garden-centred oasis - a winner in the World Luxury Awards 2024 - is a reprieve from the Porto's lively, tile-covered streets. Soak up the sunshine by the pool, stroll the manicured grounds and rejuvenate in the onsite sauna.

For a taste of tradition head to Le Palais Restaurant, offering an incredible selection of high-quality seafood prepared with the freshest ingredients, served in the surrounding of gold-panelled walls and sparking glass chandeliers.

title: Modern Porto City Break with Guaranteed Room Upgrade, Daily Breakfast & Wine-Tasting Experience
description: From the sweetness of its namesake wine to colourful neighbourhoods bathed in Mediterranean sun, Porto exudes an undeniable romance - and HF Ipanema Park is the perfect launchpad to this city of delights. Located between the river, the sea and the city centre, enjoy the best of Porto tasting wine flights and exploring historic ships at Quinta da Boeira just minutes from your stay. The hotel has a sleek, contemporary feel, lending an air of refinement to your stay, with an elegant collection of guestrooms adorned in effortless modern design. Exceptional facilities ensure a comfortable stay, with an outdoor pool, rooftop bar, fitness centre and onsite Jardim de Inverno restaurant to pamper your palate with lip-smacking dishes.

vendor_name: Holiday Inn Express Porto City Centre
title: Porto City Stay on Santa Catarina Shopping Street
description: On Porto's dynamic Rua Santa Catarina, the Holiday Inn Express Porto City Centre, an IHG Hotel, is your gateway to the best of this vibrant city. Incredible sights and culinary spots are within easy reach - start your day with an energising Express Start breakfast, then shop 'til you drop in trendy boutiques and marvel at the tiled facades of heritage churches before stopping for refreshments at the Mercado do Bolhão or back at the Express Bar & Café.
location_description: Holiday Inn Express Porto City Centre, an IHG Hotel
offer_address: Rua de Santa Catarina 661 e 663, Porto 4000-454, Portugal

title: International Luxury within Portugal's Historic Port Wine Capital
description: In the heart of Portugal's port wine capital, Crowne Plaza Porto, an IHG Hotel, is an urban oasis for good food, wine and relaxation. Savour succulent seafood at SOMOS Restaurant & Lounge, indulge in a tranquil treatment at Mandalay Wellness or reinvigorate your body at the onsite fitness centre. Experience the port wine of this magnificent city, marvel at heritage architecture or stroll along Ponte da Arrabida before returning for a well-earned rest.
location_description: Crowne Plaza Porto, an IHG Hotel

vendor_name: Maison Albar Hotel - Le Monumental Palace
title: French-Inspired Five-Star Elegance in the Heart of Historic Porto
description:
Discover the narrow cobbled streets and baroque architecture of Porto from the French-inspired five-star Maison Albar Hotels Le Monumental Palace, your luxe launchpad to this Portuguese coastal city. A location right in Porto's historic heart means you are within walking distance of must-see architectural masterpieces such as the ornate churches of Igreja do Carmo and Igreja dos Clérigos, Câmara Municipal do Porto town hall and the neoclassical Bolsa Palace. For beautiful views of the river and city, take the 10-minute stroll to Luís I Bridge - for contrast, visit at least once during the day and again at sunset.

The luxurious Maison Albar Hotels Le Monumental Palace, part of the renowned Leading Hotels of the World collection, is an architectural wonder in itself. Standing proud since 1930, its exquisite exteriors give way to modern comforts and five-star facilities. From the revered cuisine of Michelin-starred French chef Julien Montbabut at Le Monument to the unique Japanese fusion of internationally-acclaimed Portuguese chef Olivier Da Costa at Yakuza, the hotel's dining owns understated elegance. Meanwhile, Le Spa Nuxe is on hand to pamper weary travellers with signature facial and body treatments, perfectly complemented by a session at the indoor pool, sauna and hammam.
location_description: Maison Albar Hotels Le Monumental Palace

title: Five-Star Portugal Palace Escape in the Heart of Porto
description: Immerse yourself in Porto's beautiful culture and history with a lavish stay at InterContinental Porto - Palácio Das Cardosas, an IHG Hotel, ideally located in the heart of the picturesque Portuguese city. Built in a beautifully restored, 18th-century palace, this stunning hotel is ideal for couples and families wanting to indulge in a city break. Explore the alley-woven streets, soak in the ancestry of Porto's most significant structures and indulge in authentic Portuguese cuisine at the hotel's Astoria Restaurant.
location_description: InterContinental Porto - Palacio Das Cardosas, an IHG Hotel

title: Top-Rated Porto Heritage Palace Escape
description:
Experience the grandeur of Portuguese royalty with a stay at Torel 1884 Suites & Apartments, consistently ranked among the top hotels in Porto on Tripadvisor. Housed in a former palace dating back to 1884, this historic hotel is now a slice of sophisticated extravagance in the heart of the city, sitting just metres from some of Porto’s best sites, including the iconic Rua das Flores. If you fancy venturing a little further afield, São Bento train and metro station is a three-minute walk away.

Each room in this palatial building combines original features with styling inspired by the discoveries of Portuguese explorers as they travelled across Africa, America and Asia - think coffee, porcelain, cardamom and silk. Retreat to the top-floor library and lounge to escape reality with a good book (with tomes available in English, French, German, Portuguese and Japanese), or join the locals at Bartolomeu, the ground-floor bistro and wine bar, dishing up Portuguese flavours with a French twist. Make your way through the primarily Portuguese wine list or book in for a private tasting in the former bank safes, now storing liquid currency.
offer_address: R. de Mouzinho da Silveira N 228, 4050-417 Porto, Portugal

title: Porto Picturesque Stay near Porto Cathedral and Cais da Ribeira
description: Showcasing stunning architecture and with a vibrant riverside location, Vignette Collection Casa de Companhia, an IHG Hotel, is a five-star gateway to picturesque Porto. Rest in elegant and bright guestrooms or re-energise your body in the fully-equipped fitness centre. Savour Portuguese cuisine or indulge in a glass of Duoro port wine at the onsite bar. Venture out to explore cathedrals, museums and heritage sites or take in the views from the outdoor pool.
location_description: Vignette Collection Casa da Companhia, an IHG Hotel

title: Award-Winning Five-Star Porto Seaside Manor with Michelin-Starred Restaurant
description:
From the sweetness of its namesake wine to the terracotta rooftops bathed in the Mediterranean sun, Porto exudes an undeniable romance - and the hilltop manor that is Vila Foz Hotel & Spa, is the ultimate launchpad. Look out over the sparkling blue waves of the Atlantic from this five-star gem located just moments from the city's greatest attractions. Exceptional facilities ensure a comfortable stay. Dine at the Michelin Starred Vila Foz Restaurant where the freshest catch of the day awaits and toast at the grand bar which evokes the beauty of yesteryear with vintage interiors, ocean views, and an extensive cocktail and wine list. Soothe the mind and body with pampering, tailor-made spa treatments, an indoor swimming pool, steamy sauna and Turkish bath.  

Enjoy the very best of Porto on your doorstep: located in one of the most prestigious neighbourhoods, Foz is a seafront neighbourhood, only a 10-minute drive from the city centre. In the city, you'll find local restaurants, small, unique shops and a golden coastline. Wine lovers can explore the world-renowned Douro Valley, with tours departing daily.

title: Five-Star Art-Inspired Porto Escape with River-View Pool
description:
Centuries of culture, art and tradition are at your fingertips with a stay at Torel Avantgarde, Porto, a designer boutique hotel inspired by history’s most creative figures. Sitting high above the Portuguese coastal city, looking over rooftops to the river below, this five-star hotel is perfectly positioned for days spent exploring the city’s laneways and attractions. Wander through trendy art district Rua Miguel Bombarda or stroll to Livraria Lello bookstore, Crystal Palace gardens, Clérigos Church or Rua das Flores - all within 750m of the hotel’s imposing carved doors.

Taking both its name and design from the avant-garde era, this boutique art hotel celebrates the elegance of the 1930s alongside contemporary Portuguese artisanship. Each room takes on the personality of a painter, writer, designer or musician, and is decorated to reflect their personality and work - think Nina Simone, Joan Miro, Janis Joplin, Charlie Chaplin or Frida Kahlo. The common spaces are similarly Instagram-ready - snap a shot in front of the floral ceiling and rose walls of the onsite bar, dine at the Digby restaurant or take a dip in the pool while admiring the jaw-dropping views of the river below. Take a moment out at Calla Wellness & Spa with a massage or facial, or indulge with a meal at Sir Digby, the contemporary Portuguese restaurant and bar with two alfresco terraces.

title: Five-Star Portugal Luxury Escape with Michelin-Starred Restaurant & Wine Cellar
description: Discover Portugal in unparalleled luxury with a stay at The Yeatman Hotel, a five-star establishment with a distinguished wine cellar and restaurant boasting two Michelin stars. Treat yourself to innovative cuisine inspired by traditional flavours at the Yeatman Gastronomic Restaurant, and dive into the extensive collection of wines that inspire the décor of the hotel. Glowing infinity pools and views over Porto and the Douro River put the finishing touches on an indulgent experience.
offer_address: Rua do Choupelo, 4400-088 Vila Nova de Gaia, Portugal

title: Five-Star Porto Heritage Palace Luxury
description:
Embrace the romance and regality of Porto with an escape at Torel Palace Porto, a luxurious five-star hotel housed in a stunningly restored Romantic-era palace. This ornate oasis, once known as the Palacete Campos Navarro, takes pride of place in the middle of Porto, just steps from Batalha Square and its striking Santo Ildefonso Church, the famous Bolháo food market, and iconic shopping strip Rua Santa Catarina.

There’s no mistaking the palatial property - the jewel in its crown is a stunning skylight (claraboia), which floods the interiors with natural light, illuminating the beautifully restored stucco details, artwork and opulent textures. Each room and suite takes inspiration from the works of a regarded Portuguese writer or poet, including Florbela Espanca, José Régio and Miguel Torga, honouring their contribution to the country's cultural tapestry. Cosy up in the peaceful library or while away the day on the terrace. Continue the descent into serenity with a massage or scrub at CALLA Wellness Suite, or feast at the atmospheric BLIND Restaurant & Bar, inspired by Nobel laureate writer José Saramago, with sense-led dishes that celebrate Porto’s bounty of local and seasonal produce.
